# Hackathon Command Center Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
A fully functional front-end Hackathon Command Center built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.

## Progress Checklist
- [x] Create project structure and setup files
- [x] Setup Vite React with dependencies
- [x] Configure Tailwind CSS
- [x] Create custom useLocalStorage hook
- [x] Create core components structure
- [x] Implement Dashboard and HackathonCard
- [x] Implement AddModal and ResourceManager
- [x] Add animations with Framer Motion
- [x] Install dependencies and test

The Hackathon Command Center is now fully functional and running on http://localhost:3000/
